title: List All Stashes
description: In Git, stashing is a way to temporarily save changes that are not ready to be committed. Stashing allows you to switch branches or work on a different task without losing your current progress. Once you are ready to continue working on the changes, you can apply the stash and continue where you left off. In this lab, you will learn how to list all stashes in a Git repository.

meta.title: List All Stashes in Git Repository
meta.description: Learn how to list all stashes in a Git repository and manage your changes effectively.
meta.keywords: version control, repository, git labs, stash, git, list, git playground

verify.name: Verify for successful listing
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 列出所有贮藏
i18n.description: 在Git中，贮藏是一种临时保存尚未准备好提交的更改的方法。贮藏允许你切换分支或处理不同的任务，而不会丢失当前的进度。一旦你准备好继续处理这些更改，你可以应用贮藏并从上次中断的地方继续。在本实验中，你将学习如何列出Git仓库中的所有贮藏。

meta.title: 在Git仓库中列出所有贮藏
meta.description: 学习如何在Git仓库中列出所有贮藏并有效地管理你的更改。
meta.keywords: 版本控制, 仓库, Git实验室, 贮藏, Git, 列出, Git游乐场

verify.name: 验证是否成功列出
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
